Name: Anthony Bourdain: Parts Unknown
Title: Mississippi Delta
Desc: Anthony explores Mississippi food and history at the Big Apple Inn and Po' Monkey's Social Club.
LongDescription: Anthony explores Mississippi including the home of the "Pig Ear Sandwich," downtown Jackson's Big Apple Inn, also known as a Civil Rights Era gathering place; then on to an old sharecropper structure turned juke joint, Po' Monkey's Social Club.
